## `SetBarChartOrientation`

Sets the orientation for bars\index{graphs!bar charts} for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetBarChartOrientation(Orientation barOrientation)
```
### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| [`Orientation`](#orientation) barOrientation | The bar charts' orientation. |
:::
